## vop variable

Specialized / optimized version of  for vector operations. Uses simplified logic to dispatch on length (vector size) of `dispatch` argument.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
vop: <T extends Function>(dispatch?: number) => {
    (...args: any[]): any;
    add(dim: number, fn: T): T;
    default(fn: T): T;
    impl(dim: number): T;
}
```
